ARABIC: شَاكِرًا لِّأَنْعُمِهِ ٱجْتَبَىٰهُ وَهَدَىٰهُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He was thankful for His blessings. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Grateful to Him for His favours; so He chose him and guided him to the path that is straight,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He rendered thanks to Allah for His bounties so that Allah chose him (for His favours) and directed him to the Right Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He was thankful to God for His bounties. God chose him and guided him to the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Grateful for His blessings; Allah chose him and guided him to the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (He was) thankful for His favors. He (Allah) chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Grateful for His favors; He chose him and guided him on the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: showing thankfulness for His blessings; He chose him, and He guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thankful for His bounties; He chose him and He guided him unto a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: he was thankful for His blessings. God chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Grateful for His favours: He chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Grateful [as he was] for His blessings, He chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He showed his gratitude for the favours of Allah, who chose him, and guided him to a Straight Way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (He was) thankful for His (Allah's) Graces. He (Allah) chose him (as an intimate friend) and guided him to a Straight Path (Islamic Monotheism, neither Judaism nor Christianity).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: ever thankful for His favors. He chose him and He guided him to a Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thankful for His blessings. He chose him, and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [He was] grateful for His favors. Allah chose him and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:121] grateful [as he was] for His graces, He chose him, elected him, and guided him to a straight path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thankful for His bounties) thankful to Allah for the bounties He had bestowed upon him; (He chose him) He selected him for prophethood and Islam (and He guided him unto a straight path) He made him firm on an established path with which He is pleased, i.e. Islam.
